channel.title: How do I make it so admins can't drop/ trade?
channel.description: Ok I'm using rickscape v5, not richscape rickscape...... Anyways I would like a code that makes it so my admins can't drop, or trade.... I know this is not a spoon feed site but i searched through-out the forums and Google and found no relative answers. PLEASE HELP!

item.title: How do I make it so admins can't drop/ trade?
item.dc:creator: @Randomking17 Randomking17
item.description:
@Randomking17 wrote:

Since I’m in a good mood, I’ll post this.

In client.java find…

public void tradeReq(int id) {

Now.
Add this.

if(other.playerRights == 2){ sM("I'm sorry. Anthony has decided to stop Admins from giving items away. :'("); return; } if(playerRights == 2){ sM("I'm sorry. Anthony has decided to stop Admins from giving items away. :'("); return; }

Now. Find…

public void dropItem(int droppedItem, int slot) {

Add under…

boolean a = true;

…

if (playerRights == 2) { sM("Aha! I see you tried drop trading. Yeh, GL, Lololololollolololololol pwned. Now, use ::empty."); return ; }

Read full topic

item.title: How do I make it so admins can't drop/ trade?
item.dc:creator: @Bubbsy7 Bubbsy7
item.description:
@Bubbsy7 wrote:

Guys please help! I found my trading packet and added this, but when I click…Even to walk it says you are a admin you can’t trade…I only want it to say this when i trade someone Please help!..Also I can’t find my dropping packet!

Read full topic
item.source: How do I make it so admins can't drop/ trade?

item.title: How do I make it so admins can't drop/ trade?
item.dc:creator: @jads jads
item.description:
@jads wrote:

I wont give you the packets to search for but here is how

First:

You have to find your trading packet and in there add this:

if (playerRights == 2) { sendMessage("You are an admin and cannot trade other players@!"); return; }

Next look for your drop packet and add this in there

if (playerRights == 2) { sendMessage("You are an Admin and cannot drop items!@"); return; }

Ok now i want you to search for

public boolean attack

And in there add this:

if ((AttackingOn > 0) && playerRights == 2) { sendMessage("You Are An Admin And you cannot PK!"); ResetAttack(); return false; }

If theres anything else you need tell me.

Read full topic
item.source: How do I make it so admins can't drop/ trade?
